entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a person who has the power and mercy. He is described as being at Malfoy's mercy but then asserts that it is his own mercy that matters.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as a person who has managed to get this far despite the odds against him. He is described as having the wand and being in power over Dumbledore.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who observes Malfoy's reaction and sees his wand hand trembling.

relationships.description: Malfoy has power over Dumbledore, but Dumbledore asserts that it is his own mercy that matters.
Harry observes Malfoy's reaction and sees his wand hand trembling.
